title: Online Discussion-Based Mathematics Knowledge Construction Strategies for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course for current professionals, utilizing VR simulations to discuss real-life problem-solving scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can analyze math problems presented in a VR simulation environment and derive solutions through discussion-based collaboration.
Learners can expand logical thinking and engage in higher-order knowledge construction via teacher-led summaries and Socratic questioning.
Learners can propose optimal mathematical approaches by incorporating peer feedback in three or more problem-solving projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
